attributes.action: Stop charging such high amounts of inheritance tax
attributes.additional_details: It’s not fair to work hard to leave things in place to help the families left behind and then you want to charge them such high high amounts for having money that they worked hard for.
attributes.background: Change this. People pay all their life and now you want even more of people that worked hard for their money to leave for their family/friends and even when they have passed away you want more money of them.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Raise the Inheritance Tax threshold from £325,000 to £1 million: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622532

Abolish Inheritance Tax: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/626369

If you want inheritance tax to be changed in a different way to the above petitions you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
